name: ROD Multiplayer #1 Car Driving
description:
ROD Multiplayer Car Driving offers you the best online multiplayer car racing simulation experience and a great way to drift extreme car in big fun city against people from all over the world.
Get ready for cool extreme drift races, online multiplayer street races and mega ramp parkour shows where you can play with 6 people at the same time and chat with your friends!

Whether you like drifting in street racing or dirtying the fenders in simulation driving mode, ROD Multiplayer Car Driving is one of the best drift and city driving simulation games you can play.
With the ROD Multiplayer Car game, which you can play in different modes, you can travel in the simulation driving mode or do the best drifting moves with the drift mode!

With its realistic driving physics, turbo and extreme fun, ROD Multiplayer Car Driving adds a different atmosphere to mobile racing games.
Start having fun in console quality racing game with customizable controls, chat system and exciting 3D graphics. Now you can experience extreme fun by making the asphalt cry on the streets with ROD Multiplayer Car Driving, one of the world's most popular simulation and high torque drift car games on your phone.

Do you have what it takes to be the best driver in online multiplayer racing games? Show off your skills against other racers with ROD Multiplayer Car Driving!

Collect and customize a fleet of real-world classics and awesome supercars, then become the best driver with crazy drifts! Feel the crazy sound of the engine.
- Sport Car, Classic Car, Lowriders, 4x4 OffRoad Cars and more
- Customize real high torque drift cars, classic lowriders and 4x4 offroad cars and race on the airport track and collect surprise rewards.

You have a unique opportunity to customize your cars.
In the game, you have more than 10 colors, textures and crazy settings for sport, classic, lowriders, 4x4 offroad cars that you can fully customize as you want.

MULTIPLAYER
Compete in real-time against opponents from around the world in online multiplayer!
Join the fun with online multiplayer live chat.
Race real racing cars with your friends in big city and mega ramp parkours.

SINGLE PLAYER
Burn the asphalt freely on mega ramps with ultimate 4x4 offroad cars in the city and do crazy jumps.
Do unique missions and collect coins.
Enjoy high torque drift cars unruly in the city with Lowriders vehicles

CUSTOMIZE
Make incredible modifications to crazy cars. Build your dream car with car colour, window colour, suspension and many more.

CONTROLS
Choose the best one for you from 3 different precision controls.

CONSOLE QUALITY NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
ROD Multiplayer feels amazing on mobile with great visuals.

DRIVE MODE
Choose from simulation, drift and arcade modes.

MUSIC PLAYLIST
Select the music you want from the music list and listen.

FEATURES
● More than 10 cars that can be Customize (Car Paint, Suspension)
● Simulation, Drift, Arcade Driving Modes
● Detailed City and Tracks
● Fun Quests
● Simple and Easy Controller
● Unlimited fun with Free Mode
● Play with your friends in Online Multiplayer Mode
● Online Multiplayer Chat System
● Different Camera Angles
● Start / Stop feature
● Realistic Traffic
● Fuel System
● Realistic Car Damage
● Music Playlist

* A network connection is required for Multiplayer mode.
* Supported devices: iPhone 7 and above.
* Devices with low ram (less than 2GB) may not be able to run the game
* If you find a bug with the game please let us know to fix it before leaving a negative comment.
